title: Suits and Sunscreen
description: Jade Thompson has one great big passion in her life - soap actor extraordinaire Gregry Tinsley. If she could, she would crawl into her TV screen and be with him forever. When the ad agency she works for hosts a corporate retreat in sunny Florida - where his soap "Surf's Up, Dude" is shot - Jade is convinced all her dreams are about to come true. Will reality live up to Jade's fantasies or will she find something other than what she was looking for?
author: A.J.   Hill
